title: Siegel $\mathfrak{p}^2$ Vectors for Representations of $GSp(4)$
abstract:
Let $F$ be a $p$-adic field and $(\pi, V)$ an irreducible complex
representation of $G=GSp(4, F)$ with trivial central character. Let ${\rm
Si}(\mathfrak{p}^2)\subset G$ denote the Siegel congruence subgroup of level
$\mathfrak{p}^2$ and $u\in N_G({\rm Si}(\mathfrak{p}^2))$ the Atkin-Lehner
element. We compute the dimension of the space of ${\rm
Si}(\mathfrak{p}^2)$-fixed vectors in $V$ as well as the signatures of the
involutions $\pi(u)$ acting on these spaces.
